contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 30th day of September, 2010, the Application for Leave to File Original Process and the Petition for Writ of Prohibition are DISMISSED. See Commonwealth v. Reid, 537 Pa. 167, 642 A.2d 453 (1994) (hybrid representation is improper). The Prothonotary is directed to forward this filing to counsel of record.
